subsection.name: Description
subsection.div: Checks whether files use a specific line-ending sequence (LF, CRLF, or CR).
subsection.p: A violation is reported for each line whose actual line ending does not match the configured one.

subsection.name: Notes
subsection.p: Files containing mixed line endings may produce multiple violations, one for each non-matching line.

tr.td: Specify the file extensions of the files to process.
